name: AVPlayerInterstitialEventMonitor
desc: An object that monitors the scheduling and progress of interstitial events.

items.name: init(primaryPlayer: AVPlayer)
items.desc: Creates an observer with a player item.

items.name: class let currentEventDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification the system posts when the monitor’s current interstitial event changes.

items.name: class let eventsDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification the system posts when the monitor’s schedule of interstitial events changes.

items.name: var primaryPlayer: AVPlayer?
items.desc: An object that plays primary content.

items.name: var interstitialPlayer: AVQueuePlayer
items.desc: An object that plays interstitial content.
